display_long_description:
Get behind the wheel and feel every bump on the road! Off-Road Truck brings an intense driving experience directly to your Meta Quest. This isn't just about speed; it's about control, precision, and mastering the laws of physics.

Your mission is simple but challenging: Transport a truckload of heavy barrels across treacherous terrain. However, the road ahead is filled with steep hills, sharp turns, and rough dirt tracks that will test your driving skills to the limit.

Key Features:

Physics-Based Gameplay: Your cargo is loose! Drive carefully to prevent the barrels from tumbling out of the truck bed. Balance is key.

Immersive VR Controls: Grab the virtual steering wheel and feel like you are truly in the driver's seat. Look around, check your surroundings, and navigate the wild.

Fuel & Resource Management: Keep a close eye on your fuel gauge. Plan your moves and drive efficiently to reach the next checkpoint before you run dry.

Challenging Environments: Drive through scenic landscapes, from dusty tracks to vibrant autumn forests, all while racing against the clock.

Risk vs. Reward: Drive faster to improve your time, but risk losing your cargo. Earn in-game money for every successful delivery to prove your mastery.

Do you have the steady hands required to conquer these roads? Put on your headset, start the engine, and prove you are the ultimate driver in Off-Road Truck!
